member.summary: Post only order (only availalbe for limit orders)

member.summary: Order volume expressed in quote asset. This is supported only for market orders (viqc)

member.name: T:Kraken.Net.Enums.OrderTypeMinimal
member.summary: Order type, limited to market or limit

member.name: T:Kraken.Net.Enums.StakingTransactionStatus
member.summary: The current status of the staking transaction.

member.name: F:Kraken.Net.Enums.SystemStatus.Online
member.summary: Kraken is operating normally. All order types may be submitted and trades can occur.

member.name: F:Kraken.Net.Enums.SystemStatus.Maintenance
member.summary: The exchange is offline. No new orders or cancelations may be submitted.

member.name: F:Kraken.Net.Enums.SystemStatus.CancelOnly
member.summary: Resting (open) orders can be canceled but no new orders may be submitted. No trades will occur.

member.name: F:Kraken.Net.Enums.SystemStatus.PostOnly
member.summary: Only post-only limit orders can be submitted. Existing orders may still be canceled. No trades will occur.

Password or authentication app code if enabled
The symbol the order is on
A client id to reference the order by

Price of the order: Limit=limit price, StopLoss=stop loss price, TakeProfit=take profit price, StopLossProfit=stop loss price, StopLossProfitLimit=stop loss price, StopLossLimit=stop loss trigger price, TakeProfitLimit=take profit trigger price, TrailingStop=trailing stop offset, TrailingStopLimit=trailing stop offset, StopLossAndLimit=stop loss price,

Secondary price of an order: StopLossProfit/StopLossProfitLimit=take profit price, StopLossLimit/TakeProfitLimit=triggered limit price, TrailingStopLimit=triggered limit offset, StopLossAndLimit=limit price
Only validate inputs, don't actually place the order
Password or authentication app code if enabled
Time-in-force of the order to specify how long it should remain in the order book before being cancelled
